item.name: Aesthir Glider
item.text: Flying Aesthir Glider can't block.
item.flavorText: "A fine example of the rewards of artifice: a thoroughly obedient steed with wings of Soldevi steel." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Aesthir Glider
item.text: Flying Aesthir Glider can't block.
item.flavorText: "A fine example of the rewards of artifice: a thoroughly obedient steed with wings of Soldevi steel." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Agent of Stromgald
item.text: {R}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "The ‘fabled' Order of Stromgald is cast to the four winds, lost for all time. I, for one, give them no thought." —General Varchild

item.name: Agent of Stromgald
item.text: {R}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "The ‘fabled' Order of Stromgald is cast to the four winds, lost for all time. I, for one, give them no thought." —General Varchild

item.name: Arcane Denial
item.text: Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

item.name: Arcane Denial
item.text: Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

item.name: Ashnod's Cylix
item.text: {3}, {T}: Target player looks at the top three cards of his or her library, puts one of them back on top of his or her library, then exiles the rest.
item.flavorText: Few remember that Ashnod's defilement of Terisiare's resources outstripped even that of her peers.

item.name: Astrolabe
item.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Astrolabe: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

item.name: Astrolabe
item.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Astrolabe: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

item.name: Awesome Presence
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked unless defending player pays {3} for each creature he or she controls that's blocking it.
item.flavorText: "I shape my weapons from the fears of my enemies." —Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

item.name: Awesome Presence
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked unless defending player pays {3} for each creature he or she controls that's blocking it.
item.flavorText: "I shape my weapons from the fears of my enemies." —Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

item.name: Balduvian Dead
item.text: {2}{R}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Put a 3/1 black and red Graveborn creature token with haste onto the battlefield. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.name: Balduvian Horde
item.text: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.
item.flavorText: "Peace will come only when we have taken Varchild's head." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Balduvian Trading Post
item.text: If Balduvian Trading Post would enter the battlefield, sacrifice an untapped Mountain instead. If you do, put Balduvian Trading Post onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {1}{R} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Balduvian Trading Post deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.

item.name: Balduvian War-Makers
item.text: Haste Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
item.flavorText: "We send our best to battle, but every man, woman, and child will stand against Varchild's butchers."Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Balduvian War-Makers
item.text: Haste Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
item.flavorText: "We send our best to battle, but every man, woman, and child will stand against Varchild's butchers."Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Benthic Explorers
item.text: {T}, Untap a tapped land an opponent controls: Add one mana of any type that land could produce to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: The rising oceans brought new lakes—and new terrors—to Terisiare. The Explorers found their ancient enemies spawning everywhere.

item.name: Benthic Explorers
item.text: {T}, Untap a tapped land an opponent controls: Add one mana of any type that land could produce to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: The rising oceans brought new lakes—and new terrors—to Terisiare. The Explorers found their ancient enemies spawning everywhere.

item.name: Bestial Fury
item.text: Enchant creature When Bestial Fury enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

item.name: Bestial Fury
item.text: Enchant creature When Bestial Fury enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

item.name: Bounty of the Hunt
item.text: You may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay Bounty of the Hunt's mana cost. Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures. For each +1/+1 counter you put on a creature this way, remove a +1/+1 counter from that creature at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

item.name: Browse
item.text: {2}{U}{U}: Look at the top five cards of your library, put one of them into your hand, and exile the rest.
item.flavorText: "Once great literature—now great litter." —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

item.name: Burnout
item.text: Counter target instant spell if it's blue. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "GOTCHA" —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

item.name: Carrier Pigeons
item.text: Flying When Carrier Pigeons enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "Birds know no borders Why, then, should we?" —General Varchild, in a missive to King Darien of Kjeldor

item.name: Carrier Pigeons
item.text: Flying When Carrier Pigeons enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "Birds know no borders Why, then, should we?" —General Varchild, in a missive to King Darien of Kjeldor

item.name: Casting of Bones
item.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, draw three cards, then discard one of them.
item.flavorText: "Whether whole or not, still we serve Lim-Dûl's wishes." —Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

item.name: Casting of Bones
item.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, draw three cards, then discard one of them.
item.flavorText: "Whether whole or not, still we serve Lim-Dûl's wishes." —Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

item.name: Chaos Harlequin
item.text: {R}: Exile the top card of your library. If that card is a land card, Chaos Harlequin gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Otherwise, Chaos Harlequin gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.name: Contagion
item.text: You may pay 1 life and exile a black card from your hand rather than pay Contagion's mana cost. Distribute two -2/-1 counters among one or two target creatures.

item.name: Deadly Insect
item.text: Shroud (This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
item.flavorText: "There is no time for pain when this beast leaves its terrible sting." —Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

item.name: Deadly Insect
item.text: Shroud (This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
item.flavorText: "There is no time for pain when this beast leaves its terrible sting." —Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

item.name: Death Spark
item.text: Death Spark deals 1 damage to target creature or player. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Death Spark is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may pay {1}. If you do, return Death Spark to your hand.

item.name: Diminishing Returns
item.text: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You exile the top ten cards of your library. Then each player draws up to seven cards.

item.name: Diseased Vermin
item.text: Whenever Diseased Vermin deals combat damage to a player, put an infection counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, Diseased Vermin deals X damage to target opponent previously dealt damage by it, where X is the number of infection counters on it.

item.name: Dystopia
item.text: Cumulative upkeep—Pay 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a green or white permanent.

item.name: Elvish Bard
item.text: All creatures able to block Elvish Bard do so.

item.name: Elvish Ranger
item.flavorText: "No one may fault an Elvish Ranger's heart, but the simplest frailty may fell even the proudest warrior." —Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

item.name: Elvish Ranger
item.flavorText: "No one may fault an Elvish Ranger's heart, but the simplest frailty may fell even the proudest warrior." —Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

item.name: Elvish Spirit Guide
item.text: Exile Elvish Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "We are never without guidance, if we but seek it." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

item.name: Energy Arc
item.text: Untap any number of target creatures. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by those creatures this turn.
item.flavorText: "Relent, and you may transcend your situation." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

item.name: Enslaved Scout
item.text: {2}: Enslaved Scout gains mountainwalk until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Even the basest creatures may serve a purpose. Still, their lives need be only as long as the paths we tread." —General Varchild

item.name: Enslaved Scout
item.text: {2}: Enslaved Scout gains mountainwalk until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Even the basest creatures may serve a purpose. Still, their lives need be only as long as the paths we tread." —General Varchild

item.text: Put a 1/1 white Knight creature token with banding onto the battlefield. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. item.flavorText: "Call every able sword to our side. Kjeldor will stand triumphant" —King Darien of Kjeldor

item.text: Exile target nonwhite attacking creature. You gain life equal to its toughness.

item.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

item.name: Fatal Lore
item.text: An opponent chooses one — You draw three cards; or you destroy up to two target creatures that opponent controls and that player draws up to three cards. Those creatures can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "All knowledge has its price." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

item.flavorText: "We are not yet free of Lim-Dûl's terrors." —Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.flavorText: Viscerid dams may be of living creatures as well as bones and mud.

item.text: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay Force of Will's mana cost. Counter target spell.

If you sacrifice a snow Forest this way, Gargantuan Gorilla gains trample until end of turn. {T}: Gargantuan Gorilla deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Gargantuan Gorilla.

item.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn and you gain 1 life.

item.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn and you gain 1 life.

item.text: Trample; rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.) Gorilla Berserkers can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

item.name: Guerrilla Tactics
item.text: Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to target creature or player. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Guerrilla Tactics
item.text: Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to target creature or player. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Gustha's Scepter
item.text: {T}: Exile a card from your hand face down. You may look at it for as long as it remains exiled. {T}: Return a card you own exiled with Gustha's Scepter to your hand. When you lose control of Gustha's Scepter, put all cards exiled with Gustha's Scepter into their owners' graveyards.

item.name: Hail Storm
item.text: Hail Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and 1 damage to you and each creature you control.
item.flavorText: "If they can't take the hail, they'd better stay home." —Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

item.name: Heart of Yavimaya
item.text: If Heart of Yavimaya would enter the battlefield, sacrifice a Forest instead. If you do, put Heart of Yavimaya onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.name: Helm of Obedience
item.text: {X}, {T}: Target opponent puts cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard until a creature card or X cards are put into that graveyard this way, whichever comes first. If a creature card is put into that graveyard this way, sacrifice Helm of Obedience and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. X can't be 0.

item.name: Inheritance
item.text: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {3}. If you do, draw a card.
item.flavorText: "More than lessons may be gained from the past." —Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.text: When Insidious Bookworms is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, target player discards a card at random.

item.name: Insidious Bookworms
item.text: When Insidious Bookworms is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, target player discards a card at random.

item.name: Ivory Gargoyle
item.text: Flying When Ivory Gargoyle is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step and you skip your next draw step. {4}{W}: Exile Ivory Gargoyle.

item.name: Juniper Order Advocate
item.text: Green creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as Juniper Order Advocate is untapped.
item.flavorText: "In these troubled times, we alone carry the hope of reconciliation between Elf and Human." —Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

item.name: Kaysa
item.text: Green creatures you control get +1/+1.
item.flavorText: Kaysa speaks as the Elder Druid, but Yavimaya recognizes only one voice: its own.

item.name: Keeper of Tresserhorn
item.text: Whenever Keeper of Tresserhorn attacks and isn't blocked, it assigns no combat damage this turn and defending player loses 2 life.

item.name: Kjeldoran Escort
item.text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
item.flavorText: "We willingly trade with Kjeldor, but the peace we build must come from both our lands." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Kjeldoran Escort
item.text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. item.flavorText: "We willingly trade with Kjeldor, but the peace we build must come from both our lands." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Kjeldoran Home Guard
item.text: At end of combat, if Kjeldoran Home Guard attacked or blocked this combat, put a -0/-1 counter on Kjeldoran Home Guard and put a 0/1 white Deserter creature token onto the battlefield.

item.name: Kjeldoran Outpost
item.text: If Kjeldoran Outpost would enter the battlefield, sacrifice a Plains instead. If you do, put Kjeldoran Outpost onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. {1}{W}, {T}: Put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.

item.name: Kjeldoran Pride
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2. {2}{U}: Attach Kjeldoran Pride to target creature other than enchanted creature.

item.name: Kjeldoran Pride
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2. {2}{U}: Attach Kjeldoran Pride to target creature other than enchanted creature.

item.name: Krovikan Horror
item.text: At the beginning of the end step, if Krovikan Horror is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may return Krovikan Horror to your hand. {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Krovikan Horror deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Krovikan Plague
item.text: Enchant non-Wall creature you control When Krovikan Plague enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Enchanted creature has "{T}: Put a -0/-1 counter on this creature, and Krovikan Plague deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

item.name: Lake of the Dead
item.text: If Lake of the Dead would enter the battlefield, sacrifice a Swamp instead. If you do, put Lake of the Dead onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice a Swamp: Add {B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

item.name: Lat-Nam's Legacy
item.text: Shuffle a card from your hand into your library. If you do, draw two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "All the knowledge of Lat-Nam could not protect its sages from the Brothers' War."Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

item.flavorText: "All the knowledge of Lat-Nam could not protect its sages from the Brothers' War."Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

item.name: Library of Lat-Nam
item.text: An opponent chooses one — You draw three cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep; or you search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

item.name: Lim-Dûl's High Guard
item.text: First strike {1}{B}: Regenerate Lim-Dûl's High Guard.
item.flavorText: "The Guard will forever stand ready. For them, death is merely an inconvenience, not an ending."Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

item.name: Lim-Dûl's High Guard
item.text: First strike {1}{B}: Regenerate Lim-Dûl's High Guard.
item.flavorText: "The Guard will forever stand ready. For them, death is merely an inconvenience, not an ending."Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

item.name: Lim-Dûl's Paladin
item.text: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Lim-Dûl's Paladin unless you discard a card. If you sacrifice it this way, draw a card. Whenever Lim-Dûl's Paladin becomes blocked, it gets +6/+3 until end of turn. Whenever Lim-Dûl's Paladin attacks and isn't blocked, it assigns no combat damage this turn and defending player loses 4 life.

item.name: Lim-Dûl's Vault
item.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. As many times as you choose, you may pay 1 life, put those cards on the bottom of your library, then look at the top five cards of your library. Then shuffle your library and put the last cards you looked at this way on top of it in any order.

item.name: Lodestone Bauble
item.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Lodestone Bauble: Put up to four target basic land cards from a player's graveyard on top of his or her library in any order. That player draws a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

item.name: Lord of Tresserhorn
item.text: When Lord of Tresserhorn enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life, you sacrifice two creatures, and target opponent draws two cards. {B}: Regenerate Lord of Tresserhorn.

item.name: Martyrdom
item.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains "{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn is dealt to this creature instead." Only you may activate this ability.
item.flavorText: "The only true immortality is in dying for a cause." —Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.name: Martyrdom
item.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains "{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn is dealt to this creature instead." Only you may activate this ability.
item.flavorText: "The only true immortality is in dying for a cause." —Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.name: Misfortune
item.text: An opponent chooses one — You put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and gain 4 life; or you put a -1/-1 counter on each creature that player controls and Misfortune deals 4 damage to him or her.

item.name: Mishra's Groundbreaker
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Groundbreaker: Target land becomes a 3/3 artifact creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
item.flavorText: The very ground yielded to Mishra's wishes.

item.name: Misinformation
item.text: Put up to three target cards from an opponent's graveyard on top of his or her library in any order.
item.flavorText: "When you cannot rely on your sources, trust your own senses. When you cannot trust those, you must follow your instincts."Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Mystic Compass
item.text: {1}, {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "And I say north is where I want it to be" —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

item.name: Nature's Blessing
item.text: {G}{W}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or that creature gains banding, first strike, or trample. (This effect lasts indefinitely. Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
item.flavorText: "Be open to the blessings, whatever their form." Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

item.name: Nature's Chosen
item.text: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature has "{0}: Untap this creature. Activate this ability only during your turn and only once each turn." As long as enchanted creature is white, it has "{T}: Untap target artifact, creature, or land. Activate this ability only once each turn."

item.name: Nature's Wrath
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nature's Wrath unless you pay {G}. Whenever a player puts an Island or blue permanent onto the battlefield, he or she sacrifices an Island or blue permanent. Whenever a player puts a Swamp or black permanent onto the battlefield, he or she sacrifices a Swamp or black permanent.

item.name: Noble Steeds
item.text: {1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Only an animal born in the wild has sufficient heart to be a true Knight's steed." —King Darien of Kjeldor

item.name: Noble Steeds
item.text: {1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Only an animal born in the wild has sufficient heart to be a true Knight's steed." —King Darien of Kjeldor

item.name: Omen of Fire
item.text:
Return all Islands to their owners' hands.
Each player sacrifices a Plains or a white permanent for each white permanent he or she controls.
item.flavorText: "Let Balduvia burn to warm Kjeldor's hearth" —General Varchild

item.name: Phantasmal Fiend
item.text: {B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

item.name: Phantasmal Fiend
item.text: {B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

item.name: Phantasmal Sphere
item.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Phantasmal Sphere, then sacrifice Phantasmal Sphere unless you pay {1} for each +1/+1 counter on it. When Phantasmal Sphere leaves the battlefield, put a blue Orb creature token with flying onto the battlefield under an opponent's control. That creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Phantasmal Sphere.

item.name: Phelddagrif
item.text: {G}: Phelddagrif gains trample until end of turn. Target opponent puts a 1/1 green Hippo creature token onto the battlefield. {W}: Phelddagrif gains flying until end of turn. Target opponent gains 2 life. {U}: Return Phelddagrif to its owner's hand. Target opponent may draw a card.

item.name: Phyrexian Boon
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 as long as it's black. Otherwise, it gets -1/-2.
item.flavorText: "Phyrexia's touch is painful to all but the blackest of hearts." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

item.name: Phyrexian Boon
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 as long as it's black. Otherwise, it gets -1/-2.
item.flavorText: "Phyrexia's touch is painful to all but the blackest of hearts." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

item.name: Phyrexian Devourer
item.text: When Phyrexian Devourer's power is 7 or greater, sacrifice it. Exile the top card of your library: Put X +1/+1 counters on Phyrexian Devourer, where X is the exiled card's converted mana cost. If Phyrexian Devourer's power is 7 or greater, sacrifice it.

item.name: Phyrexian Portal
item.text: {3}: Target opponent looks at the top ten cards of your library and separates them into two face-down piles. Exile one of those piles. Search the other pile for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle the rest of that pile into your library. Activate this ability only if your library has ten or more cards in it.

item.name: Phyrexian War Beast
item.text: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.
item.flavorText: "Knowing its origins, how could they have thought they could control it?" —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.name: Phyrexian War Beast
item.text: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.
item.flavorText: "Knowing its origins, how could they have thought they could control it?" —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.name: Pillage
item.text: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "Were they to reduce us to ash, we would clog their throats and sting their eyes in payment." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Primitive Justice
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Primitive Justice, you may pay {1}{R} and/or {1}{G} any number of times. Destroy target artifact. For each additional {1}{R} you paid, destroy another target artifact. For each additional {1}{G} you paid, destroy another target artifact, and you gain 1 life.

item.name: Pyrokinesis
item.text: You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay Pyrokinesis's mana cost. Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.
item.flavorText: "Anybody want some . . . toast?" —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

item.name: Reinforcements
item.text: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
item.flavorText: "Let them send their legions I will show them that my truth is stronger than their swords." —General Varchild

item.name: Reinforcements
item.text: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
item.flavorText: "Let them send their legions I will show them that my truth is stronger than their swords." —General Varchild

item.name: Reprisal
item.text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "Kjeldor's borders are secure, and its citizens are prepared to take up arms in defense of their families." —King Darien of Kjeldor

item.name: Reprisal
item.text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "Kjeldor's borders are secure, and its citizens are prepared to take up arms in defense of their families." —King Darien of Kjeldor

item.name: Ritual of the Machine
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Ritual of the Machine, sacrifice a creature. Gain control of target nonblack, nonartifact creature.
item.flavorText: "Rumors persist of dark deeds performed in the depths of Soldev. When will Dagsson heed the danger therein?" —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.name: Rogue Skycaptain
item.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, put a wage counter on Rogue Skycaptain. You may pay {2} for each wage counter on it. If you don't, remove all wage counters from Rogue Skycaptain and an opponent gains control of it.

item.name: Royal Decree
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever a Swamp, Mountain, black permanent, or red permanent becomes tapped, Royal Decree deals 1 damage to that permanent's controller.

item.name: Royal Herbalist
item.text: {2}, Exile the top card of your library: You gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: "Just as an Herbalist heals a wound, so must we heal the rift between Balduvia and Kjeldor." —King Darien of Kjeldor

item.name: Royal Herbalist
item.text: {2}, Exile the top card of your library: You gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: "Just as an Herbalist heals a wound, so must we heal the rift between Balduvia and Kjeldor." —King Darien of Kjeldor

item.name: Scarab of the Unseen
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice Scarab of the Unseen: Return all Auras attached to target permanent you own to their owners' hands. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

item.name: Scars of the Veteran
item.text: You may exile a white card from your hand rather than pay Scars of the Veteran's mana cost. Prevent the next 7 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, put a +0/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.

item.name: School of the Unseen
item.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: After the terrible retribution visited upon Lat-Nam, this school of mages chose to hide from the eyes of the world.

item.name: Seasoned Tactician
item.text: {3}, Exile the top four cards of your library: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
item.flavorText: "The benefits of peace far outweigh the pride of Generals." —King Darien of Kjeldor

item.name: Sheltered Valley
item.text: If Sheltered Valley would enter the battlefield, instead sacrifice each other permanent named Sheltered Valley you control, then put Sheltered Valley onto the battlefield. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control three or fewer lands, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

item.name: Shield Sphere
item.text: Defender Whenever Shield Sphere blocks, put a -0/-1 counter on it.
item.flavorText: "My Soldiers know that they need never fear for their protection." —King Darien of Kjeldor

item.name: Sol Grail
item.text: As Sol Grail enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Look deep into the Grail, and see there what you desire most."Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

item.name: Soldevi Adnate
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice a black or artifact creature: Add an amount of black mana equal to the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "An idiot cannot hear sense, even when a thousand people speak it." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.name: Soldevi Adnate
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice a black or artifact creature: Add an amount of black mana equal to the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "An idiot cannot hear sense, even when a thousand people speak it." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.name: Soldevi Digger
item.text: {2}: Put the top card of your graveyard on the bottom of your library.
item.flavorText: "This ceaseless device has helped uncover marvels unreachable by mere flesh." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Soldevi Excavations
item.text: If Soldevi Excavations would enter the battlefield, sacrifice an untapped Island instead. If you do, put Soldevi Excavations onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {1}{U} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.

item.name: Soldevi Heretic
item.text: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Target opponent may draw a card.
item.flavorText: "In the arms of tragedy, there is little comfort in being right." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.name: Soldevi Heretic
item.text: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Target opponent may draw a card.
item.flavorText: "In the arms of tragedy, there is little comfort in being right." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.name: Soldevi Sage
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice two lands: Draw three cards, then discard one of them.
item.flavorText: "To hide the truth is more than folly—it is fatal." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.name: Soldevi Sage
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice two lands: Draw three cards, then discard one of them.
item.flavorText: "To hide the truth is more than folly—it is fatal." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.name: Soldevi Sentry
item.text: {1}: Choose target opponent. Regenerate Soldevi Sentry. When it regenerates this way, that player may draw a card.
item.flavorText: "A dreadful invention. What ease is there under the watchful eye of cold steel?" —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.name: Soldevi Sentry
item.text: {1}: Choose target opponent. Regenerate Soldevi Sentry. When it regenerates this way, that player may draw a card.
item.flavorText: "A dreadful invention. What ease is there under the watchful eye of cold steel?" —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.name: Soldevi Steam Beast
item.text: Whenever Soldevi Steam Beast becomes tapped, target opponent gains 2 life. {2}: Regenerate Soldevi Steam Beast.
item.flavorText: "Nothing has ever broken my heart so much as this—the betrayal of Soldev by my beloved machines"Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Soldevi Steam Beast
item.text: Whenever Soldevi Steam Beast becomes tapped, target opponent gains 2 life. {2}: Regenerate Soldevi Steam Beast.
item.flavorText: "Nothing has ever broken my heart so much as this—the betrayal of Soldev by my beloved machines"Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Soldier of Fortune
item.text: {R}, {T}: Target player shuffles his or her library.
item.flavorText: "Loyalty to coin alone is loyalty nonetheless." —General Varchild

item.name: Spiny Starfish
item.text: {U}: Regenerate Spiny Starfish. At the beginning of each end step, if Spiny Starfish regenerated this turn, put a 0/1 blue Starfish creature token onto the battlefield for each time it regenerated this turn.

item.name: Splintering Wind
item.text: {2}{G}: Splintering Wind deals 1 damage to target creature. Put a 1/1 green Splinter creature token onto the battlefield. It has flying and "Cumulative upkeep {G}." (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless he or she pays its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever a Splinter token leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and each creature you control.

item.name: Stench of Decay
item.text: Nonartifact creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Disa is dead, and I am left. I shall allow no others to succumb to this pestilence." —Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

item.text: Nonartifact creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Disa is dead, and I am left. I shall allow no others to succumb to this pestilence." —Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

item.text: Each player may play an additional land during each of his or her turns. Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.

item.text: Whenever Stromgald Spy attacks and isn't blocked, you may have defending player play with his or her hand revealed for as long as Stromgald Spy remains on the battlefield. If you do, Stromgald Spy assigns no combat damage this turn.

item.name: Suffocation
item.text: Cast Suffocation only if you were dealt damage this turn by a red instant or sorcery spell. Suffocation deals 4 damage to the controller of the last red instant or sorcery spell that dealt damage to you this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

item.name: Surge of Strength
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Surge of Strength, discard a red or green card. Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

item.name: Sustaining Spirit
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {1}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
item.flavorText: "Faith is our greatest protector." —Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.name: Swamp Mosquito
item.text: Flying Whenever Swamp Mosquito attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

item.name: Swamp Mosquito
item.text: Flying Whenever Swamp Mosquito attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

item.name: Sworn Defender
item.text: {1}: Sworn Defender's power becomes the toughness of target creature blocking or being blocked by Sworn Defender minus 1 until end of turn, and Sworn Defender's toughness becomes 1 plus the power of that creature until end of turn.

item.text: Cumulative upkeep—Exile the top card of your library. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Thought Lash's cumulative upkeep isn't paid, exile all cards from your library. Exile the top card of your library: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

item.name: Tidal Control

Activate this ability only once each turn.

item.text: As an additional cost to cast Undergrowth, you may pay {2}{R}. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. If its additional cost was paid, Undergrowth doesn't affect combat damage that would be dealt by red creatures.
